block.p: A theater review in Weekend on Friday about ''Couples,'' a group of eight short plays at WorkShop Theater Company on West 36th Street in Manhattan, misidentified the actors in ''Right Sensation'' and misidentified a character. The actors are Jacqueline M. Raposo and Michael Anderson -- not Cailin McDonald and Anthony Aibel, who appear in ''Invisible Woman.'' The character played by Ms. Raposo is Paula -- not Susanne, a character in ''Invisible Woman'' that is played by Ms. McDonald.

A theater review in Weekend on Friday about ''Couples,'' a group of eight short plays at WorkShop Theater Company on West 36th Street in Manhattan, misidentified the actors in ''Right Sensation'' and misidentified a character. The actors are Jacqueline M. Raposo and Michael Anderson -- not Cailin McDonald and Anthony Aibel, who appear in ''Invisible Woman.'' The character played by Ms. Raposo is Paula -- not Susanne, a character in ''Invisible Woman'' that is played by Ms. McDonald.
